item.title: Dungeon & Fighter: ARAD debut trailer, details, and screenshots
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/dungeon-fighter-arad-debut-trailer-details-and-screenshots

  • PC
  • Smartphone

Open-world action adventure RPG from Nexon.

Nexon has released the first trailer, information, and screenshots for Dungeon & Fighter: ARAD, its open-world action adventure RPG for console, PC, and mobile.

Get the details below.

Dungeon & Fighter: ARAD is a brand new title developed by Nexon Games and published by Nexon Korea for PC, mobile, and console. This open world action-adventure RPG utilizes the Dungeon & Fighter intellectual property, which boasts over 850 million players worldwide, and expands upon the Dungeon & Fighter universe with an appealing new narrative never before seen in the series. Dungeon & Fighter: ARAD features action packed combat, engaging characters and a stunning open world filled with monsters and puzzles for players to experience, all backed by the powerful Unreal Engine 5.

Dungeon & Fighter: ARAD features a variety of content, including:

  • Action Packed Combat – Dungeon & Fighter: ARAD features distinct classes each with their own diverse combat techniques that are unique to Dungeon & Fighter: ARAD, while still drawing inspiration from the action-packed combat that DNF fans know and love.
  • Engaging Characters – Players will interact with characters that have their own distinct stories, intricately and realistically portrayed with rich, robust personalities and visually captivating designs.
  • Stunning Open World – Dungeon & Fighter: ARAD boasts an expansive open world filled with stunning visuals, high quality graphics and a vibrant atmosphere, all powered by the dynamic Unreal Engine 5.
  • And So Much More! – With a wide variety of field monsters and puzzles featured throughout the massive world of Dungeon & Fighter: ARAD, players will have plenty to explore as they unravel a brand-new story in the Dungeon & Fighter universe.

In addition, Dungeon & Fighter: ARAD will make an appearance on large-scale advertisements placed around the Peacock Theater during The Game Awards ceremony. The advertisement features iconic logos from the history of the Dungeon & Fighter Universe with new images and the trailer from the Dungeon & Fighter: ARAD.

Watch the trailer below. View the screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

Screenshots

  • ❯

item.title: Onimusha: Way of the Sword announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/onimusha-way-of-the-sword-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Due out in 2026.

Capcom has announced Onimusha: Way of the Sword for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC (Steam). It will launch in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its official website:

About

Fight through bloodbaths of intense swordplay action. Explore the historic Japanese capital of Edo-era Kyoto, twisted by malevolent clouds of Malice. With every stage cloaked in mystery, danger and intrigue. Battle against monstrosities from the underworld known as Genma in a tale of dark fantasy. Follow the tale of a samurai who wields the Oni Gauntlet, a mystical artifact that grants its bearer the power to slay Genma. Through gritty, blood-soaked brawls, he searches for his reason to fight. What fate awaits at the end of his path?

About the Onimusha Series

Debuting in 2001, the first game in the Onimusha series tells the story of a young warrior during a time of widespread war in feudal Japan. Acquiring the power of the Oni, he becomes an Onimusha and battles against the evil Genma that are attempting to conquer of the world.

The game’s “Issen” critical counter action mechanic and satisfying swordplay action became defining pillars of the series.

With people and events inspired by real-life history cast into its eerie dark fantasy setting, the trials and fates of the characters painted a unique and engrossing tale that drew widespread acclaim.

Building on that success, the series has gone on to spawn numerous hit titles and even an original Netflix animation. To date the Onimusha series has sold over 8.7 million* units worldwide.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

Japanese

  • ❯

item.title: Palworld ‘Feybreak’ update launches December 23
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/palworld-feybreak-update-launches-december-23

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

New pals, weapons, buildings, mechanics, and a huge new island.

The “Feybreak” update for open-world survival crafting monster collection game Palworld will launch on December 23, developer Pocketpair announced.

The update will add new Pals, weapons, buildings, mechanics, a new faction leader, and a new island six times bigger than the previous update’s Sakurajima.

Palworld is available now in Early Access for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Xbox One, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store. It is also available via Game Pass.

Watch a new trailer below.

“Feybreak” Update Trailer
